original_text: After the king had destroyed the scroll on which Baruch had written Jeremiah's words, the Lord spoke to Jeremiah again.
korean_text: 왕이 두루마리와 바룩이 예레미야의 입을 통해 기록한 말씀을 불사른 후에 여호와의 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라 이르시되

sentences.original_text: After the king had destroyed the scroll
on which Baruch had written Jeremiah's words
the Lord spoke to Jeremiah again
